QuestData.Title: The Lorewalkers
QuestData.Description: Dear $p,$b$bWe have uncovered something tremendous in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms. A great repository of books, scrolls, and lore that has remained untouched since the days of the mogu empire.$b$bPlease, join us at your earliest convenience. You can find this Seat of Knowledge by traveling to the infamous Mogu'shan Vaults, and then flying to the landing just above the entrance.$b$bI look forward to your arrival!$b$bSincerely,$b$bLorewalker Cho
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Lorewalker Cho at the Seat of Knowledge in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
